Invocation Name: bertelsmann
des:
You can use the Bertelsmann Alexa skill to learn more about the company, listen to the latest podcast episodes, and have news from the company read out to you.

To use the skill, open it using:
"Alexa, open Bertelsmann"

If you'd like to listen to our latest podcast episodes, say:
"Play podcast"

To have the latest news from the company read out to you, use the voice command:
"Read the news"

The skill can also answer more than 100 questions about the company:

"How many countries is Bertelsmann active in?"
"What is Bertelsmann's strategy?"
"What was Penguin Random House's biggest book deal ever?"
"What is Hygge?"

If a question cannot be answered, we will try to integrate the answers as soon as possible.

If you have any questions or feedback, please contact us at: press@bertelsmann.com
